API_Description: Adds a new review server to the collaboration settings.
API_Description_Reason: The method name 'addReviewServer' suggests that it is used to add a server related to review functionalities in the collaboration context.
Returns: A boolean indicating whether the review server was successfully added.
Returns_Reason: Typically, methods that perform an action like adding a server return a boolean to indicate success or failure.

cURL.description: The URL of the review server to be added.
cURL.description_reason: The parameter name 'cURL' implies it is a string representing the server's URL.
cURL.type_reason: URLs are generally represented as strings.

cUIName.description: The user-friendly name for the review server.
cUIName.description_reason: The parameter name 'cUIName' suggests it is a name displayed in the user interface.
cUIName.type_reason: Names are typically represented as strings.

oSetting.description: An object containing additional settings for the review server.
oSetting.description_reason: The parameter 'oSetting' implies it is an object holding various configuration settings.
oSetting.type_reason: Settings are often encapsulated in objects to allow for multiple key-value pairs.

oMethod.description: The method used to connect to the review server.
oMethod.description_reason: The parameter 'oMethod' suggests it specifies the connection method or protocol.
oMethod.type_reason: Methods or protocols are typically represented as strings.
